item.description:
Dear Friends:

Attention members who are alone for Christmas Day: You are welcome to join Nancy and myself on Dec. 25th, from 2 to 6PM for a special Christmas Dinner event. I am not concerned about having a 50:50 ratio of men to women for this special event. Although we have a 50-50 ratio 90% of the time. This dinner is also for all age groups.

The fee is $30.00, including a chinese buffet dinner and, plus an open bar.

Please invite a friend who is alone and would like to be with positive, optimistic singles, who are appreciative for what we have.

Fun is the operative word. We may play games, cards, whatever you want to suggest. Give me some ideas.

We will have a warm fire blazing, with hot cider and a cozy, warm safe environment to relax and take our shoes off. Music, TV or just great conversation will be on the agenda.

Hope you can make it.

Entry fee: $30
Organizer/Host - Richard Tosti
Location is the warm, loving, supportive and relaxing environment of my home.
Dress is “professional casual” and comfortable.
2:00PM to 6:00PM
Sat. Dec. 25th, 2010
Maximum number of guests 20 – I will not refuse higher numbers.

See you on Saturday, Dec. 25 at 2:00PM.
The best is right now!
Richard Tosti

P.S. Speed dating is coming soon, offering privacy and a touch of class!


DIRECTIONS:
36 Woodridge Road
Westwood, MA
781-551-3307

128-Exit 16B/Route 109 toward Westwood
Go 2 miles left on Pond Street, just past the middle school on left. If you go by Dunkin Donuts on right, you missed it.

Go 1 mile, then left on Oak Street (Google search says go right; this is wrong.)

Go 1.5 miles to end and turn right on Brook Street.

After 100 feet, take a right on Woodridge Road.

My home is the 3rd house on the left, cream colored, number 36.
item.how_to_find_us: Welcome you at the door with a Sincere, Friendly Smile!
item.name: Christmas Singles Home Party
